bibdata.title: American National Standard Preferred Ratings and Related Required Capabilities for Indoor AC Medium-Voltage Switches Used in Metal-Enclosed Switchgear
American National Standard Preferred Ratings and Related Required Capabilities for Indoor AC Medium-Voltage Switches Used in Metal-Enclosed Switchgear

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard provides preferred ratings for indoor AC medium-voltage switches used in metal-enclosed switchgear.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
